title: [Update: Fixed] Google Maps facing partial outage on web and with third-party APIs
content:
Google Maps is partially down this morning with the outage particularly impacting its website and APIs for third-party applications that use Google’s location services.

more…

The post [Update: Fixed] Google Maps facing partial outage on web and with third-party APIs appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Maps is facing a partial outage this morning that's particularly impacting the website and its APIs for third-party applications...
